snippet: To an electorate that remains anxious about his demeanor, his honesty and his character, Mr. Trump offered no acknowledgment, no rebuttal, no explanation....
abstract: News Analysis; Donald Trump fails to offer voters any new sign of humility, generosity or depth in his speech at Republican National Convention; campaign speechwriters from both parties remark upon Trump's missed opportunity to provide personal details that would reveal more of his character; appears content to stick with strategy that won him primary contest and is seemingly unconcerned about wooing voters outside of his base of support.
lead_paragraph: To an electorate that remains anxious about his demeanor, his honesty and his character, Mr. Trump offered no acknowledgment, no rebuttal, no explanation.

headline.print_headline: Failed Chance to Humanize Outsize Image
headline.main: Escape His Caricature? Donald Trump Passes Up the Chance
